title: Welcome to your CRM
body: This quick tour shows you where the main features live. You can skip anytime.

title: Dashboard
body: Your home base. See your jobs for today, recent activity, and quick stats at a glance.

title: Customers
body: Add and manage customers. You will link them to jobs.

title: Jobs
body: Create jobs, link them to customers and services. All jobs appear on the Schedule.

title: Schedule
body: View jobs by day, week, or list. Drag to reschedule and manage your calendar.

title: Services
body: Define what you offer—services, durations, and prices. Clients see these on your booking page.

title: Invoices
body: Turn completed jobs into invoices and get paid. Send and track from here.

title: Settings & booking link
body: In Settings you can set your branding, booking page URL, payments (Stripe), and team. Share your booking link so clients can book online.

title: You are all set
body: Explore the sidebar to jump to any section. You can always reopen this tour from Settings → Help if we add that later.
